body_html:
This worked for me:

Installing tensorflow 1.10 and CUDA 9

Remove all cuda and tensorflow installations (it is important to keep the compatibility following the image):

Removing incompatible versions:

apt-get purge nvidia-cuda*
rm -rf /usr/local/cuda*

pip3 uninstall tensorflow-gpu
pip2 uninstall tensorflow-gpu

Dependence install:

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:graphics-drivers/ppa
sudo apt -y update
apt install -y nvidia-384 nvidia-384-dev gcc-6 g++-6 g++ freeglut3-dev build-essential libx11-dev libxmu-dev libxi-dev libglu1-mesa libglu1-mesa-dev

NVIDIA install:

wget http://us.download.nvidia.com/XFree86/Linux-x86_64/375.39/NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-375.39.run
chmod +x ./NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-375.39.run
./NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-375.39.run --no-opengl-files -a -s

Check install NVIDIA:

nvidia-smi

Install CUDA9

wget https://developer.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/9.0/Prod/local_installers/cuda_9.0.176_384.81_linux-run
chmod +x cuda_9.0.176_384.81_linux-run 
./cuda_9.0.176_384.81_linux-run --override

ldconfig:

echo "/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/" >> /etc/ld.so.conf
ldconfig

Check CUDA 9 INSTALL:

whereis cuda
cat /usr/local/cuda/version.txt

Install tensorflow 1.10:

pip2 install --upgrade pip
pip3 install --upgrade pip

pip2 install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu==1.10
pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu==1.10

Teste

python -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.__version__)"
python3 -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.__version__)"

Done

body:
This worked for me:

**Installing tensorflow 1.10 and CUDA 9**

Remove all cuda and tensorflow installations (it is important to keep the compatibility following the image):
![tensorflow](https://i.stack.imgur.com/xDapJ.png)

Removing incompatible versions:

```bash
apt-get purge nvidia-cuda*
rm -rf /usr/local/cuda*

pip3 uninstall tensorflow-gpu
pip2 uninstall tensorflow-gpu
```

Dependence install:

```bash
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:graphics-drivers/ppa
sudo apt -y update
apt install -y nvidia-384 nvidia-384-dev gcc-6 g++-6 g++ freeglut3-dev build-essential libx11-dev libxmu-dev libxi-dev libglu1-mesa libglu1-mesa-dev
```

NVIDIA install:

```bash
wget http://us.download.nvidia.com/XFree86/Linux-x86_64/375.39/NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-375.39.run
chmod +x ./NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-375.39.run
./NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-375.39.run --no-opengl-files -a -s
```

Check install NVIDIA:

```bash
nvidia-smi
```

Install CUDA9

```bash
wget https://developer.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/9.0/Prod/local_installers/cuda_9.0.176_384.81_linux-run
chmod +x cuda_9.0.176_384.81_linux-run 
./cuda_9.0.176_384.81_linux-run --override
```

ldconfig:

```
echo "/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/" >> /etc/ld.so.conf
ldconfig
```

Check CUDA 9 INSTALL:
```bash
whereis cuda
cat /usr/local/cuda/version.txt
```

Install tensorflow 1.10:

```bash
pip2 install --upgrade pip
pip3 install --upgrade pip

pip2 install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu==1.10
pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu==1.10
```

Teste
```bash
python -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.__version__)"
python3 -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.__version__)"
```

Done
